item.title: Down By Law
item.description: [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/deceiver_of_the_gods.md#since-i-was-born-they-have-kept-me-down-vyl-wnanory|You wake up every morning in this living hell]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/deceiver_of_the_gods.md#since-i-was-born-they-have-kept-me-down-vyl-wnanory|Not knowing that you’re worst enemy is me]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/deceiver_of_the_gods.md#since-i-was-born-they-have-kept-me-down-vyl-wnanory|You never know what can happen within this cell]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/deceiver_of_the_gods.

item.title: For My Enemies
item.description: [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/vessel/ode_to_sleep.md#but-ill-tell-them-vyl-wnanory|I’ve been waiting a long time to give you a piece of my mind.]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/vessel/ode_to_sleep.md#but-ill-tell-them-vyl-wnanory|You can run but you can’t hide from who you are inside]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/vessel/ode_to_sleep.

item.title: Lockdown
